home.title: The Answer to Mobility and Everything
home.description: We Are A Mobility AI Company. We Make Everything Autonomous and Frictionless with software and AI technology.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: Making Everything Autonomous and Frictionless
vision.description: We dream of a world where everything moves and connects autonomously through a self-operating urban transportation OS. company leads the future of mobility through software and AI technology.

technology.title: Core Technologies
technology.subtitle: Building the future of mobility with innovative technology

ai.title: AI & Machine Learning
ai.description: Enhancing the accuracy and safety of autonomous driving with cutting-edge AI technology.

software.title: Software Defined
software.description: Providing vehicle software architecture that can be updated like smartphones.

platform.title: Integrated Platform
platform.description: Building smart mobility platforms that connect vehicle, road, and transportation data.

careersPreview.title: Join Us to Change the World
careersPreview.description: We offer opportunities to change the world together in a new future mobility world where software and AI combine with automotive technology.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about us
about.description: company is a Mobility AI company that presents the future of new mobility through software-centric SDV (software-defined vehicle). We solve mobility problems with software and AI technology, making everything autonomous and frictionless.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the answer to mobility and everything, making everything autonomous and frictionless.

values.title: Core Values
values.innovationDesc: Leading the mobility industry with software and AI technology.
values.excellenceDesc: Developing vehicles that are safer and always maintain the latest performance through SDV technology.
values.integrityDesc: Leading the popularization of mobility services through autonomous driving integrated mobility platform.
values.collaborationDesc: Developing data platforms for smart mobility services by connecting vehicle, road, and transportation data.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Technology that shapes the future of mobility
services.description: company presents the future of new mobility with software and AI technology.

digitalStrategy.title: Software Defined Vehicle (SDV)
digitalStrategy.description: We develop SDVs that can be updated like smartphones to maintain safer and always up-to-date performance.

webDevelopment.title: Software Defined Fleet
webDevelopment.description: We develop data platforms for smart mobility services by connecting vehicle, road, and transportation data.

dataAnalytics.title: TAP! Autonomous Mobility Platform
dataAnalytics.description: We lead the popularization of autonomous mobility services through TAP!, an integrated autonomous driving mobility platform.
